lines.text:
[watching Kit and Rob through binoculars]
Respectable young Quaker couple returning from a quiet afternoon of nonviolent sex.
Hey guy, your fly is open and your Hostess Twinkie is hanging out.
Boy Muffy, you really know how to make a guy look forward to... dessert.
Please God, let it be Ding-Dongs!
I know you think I'm a hick, but I'd like to change your mind about that if you'd give me a chance.
Why?
Because I would really like to plow your field.
You're telling me! When I was out there swinging in the woods, I nearly crapped my pants.
What do you mean, "nearly"?
Arch? You browned your trou?
Well, uh... you know, I was...
It's all right Arch, they'll be out of the dryer soon.
Have a nice party.
Nice? It's gotta be better than nice. It's gotta be bloody unforgettable.
Oh Ha Ha. HA HA HA HA! That's really funny, you guys. Really funny! Fuck you!
Muffy hasn't been in an institution for three years, she's been at Vassar!
And don't anyone say 'April Fools' again or I'll rip them apart!
Cough-cough-April Fools!-cough-cough
[Everyone admires the view of the lake from Muffy's window]
On a clear day, you can see the Kennedys.

My name is Mary O'Reilly O'Toole O'Shea. Somewhere out there is the island my friend Muffy owns. It's spring break and she's invited us over there for the weekend and we're waiting for the ferry now to take us there, and... I don't know what else to say.
Why don't you tell us something about yourself?

Oh, alright, something about myself. Um, I wanna work with handicapped children, and my parents are my best friends. Oh, and I start convent school next semester... and I FUCK on the first date. April Fool's!
